dynamic-hql.query:
SELECT new com.netsteadfast.greenstep.vo.SysBeanHelpExprVO(m.oid, m.helpOid, m.exprId, m.exprSeq, m.runType) FROM TbSysBeanHelpExpr m WHERE 1=1
<#if helpOid??> AND m.helpOid = :helpOid </#if>
ORDER BY m.exprSeq ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM TbSysBeanHelpExpr m WHERE 1=1
<#if helpOid??> AND m.helpOid = :helpOid </#if>
